verse.name: v1
verse.lines: He lives, the great Redeemer lives, What joy the blest assurance gives! And now, before His Father, God, Pleads the full merits of His blood.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Repeated crimes awake our fears, And Justice armed with frowns appears; But in the Saviorâ€™s lovely face Sweet Mercy smiles, and all is peace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Hence, then, ye black, despairing thoughts; Above our fears, above our faults, His mighty intercessions rise, And guilt recedes, and terror dies.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: In every dark, distressful hour, When sin and Satan join their power, Let this dear hope repel the dart, That Jesus bears us on His heart.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Great Advocate, almighty Friend! On Him our humble hopes depend; Our cause can never, never fail, For Jesus pleads, and must prevail.
